question: Oxytocin will not do the following action
exp: Ans. (a) Milk production. Ref: D. C. Dutta 8th ed. /136, 574. Milk production is by Prolactin.

question: Which of the following is the cause of amenorrhoea in a lactating mother:
exp: Ans. (d) Increased prolactin level. Ref.: D. C. Dutta 8th ed. /171, 614; 6th/148. Breast feeding increases the levels of prolactin which lead to the following consequences:* Reduced ovarian response to FSH leading to hypo- estrogenic stateQ* Suppression of LH release thereby preventing LH surge and inhibiting ovulationQ* Reduces Gn. RH secretion
